dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic, two companions embarked on an epic quest.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: By the ancient oaks, Thorne! I've sensed a dark presence lurking in the heart of the forest. We must tread with caution.

dialogues.speaker: Thorne Blackwood
dialogues.text: Fear not, Eira. My sword and shield shall protect us from any foul creature that dares to stand in our way. Onward we go!
